def_en: The making of something is the act or process of producing or creating it.
If you describe a person or thing as something in the making, you mean that they are going to become known or recognized as that thing.
If something is the making of a person or thing, it is the reason that they become successful or become very much better than they used to be.

def_cn: 具备成为…的素质(或内在因素、必要条件、潜在能力)
def_en: If you say that a person or thing has the makings of something, you mean it seems possible or likely that they will become that thing, as they have the necessary qualities.

def_cn: (问题等)自己造成的;咎由自取
def_en: If you say that something such as a problem you have is of your own making, you mean you have caused or created it yourself.
